body: It is true now, and I want anyone who makes it not true to consider the implications of breaking it. In particular, this pass will need to lower anything containing a MaybeDefined into an if statement. Currently autograd graphs only have GradOf and AutogradAdd nodes, neither of which can introduce a MaybeDefined. If another node is introduced into the gradient graph, we need to adjust this pass to preserve this invariant that is being checked, otherwise lots of conditionals will start to appear. I want that change to be visible when made hence the assert rather than handling the lowering case.
